items.title: James Watson, co-discoverer of the double-helix shape of DNA, has died at age 97
items.description: Scientist James Watson, who shared a Nobel prize for helping discover the double-helix shape of the DNA molecule, has died

items.title: Government shutdown updates: Schumer outlines Dems' offer to reopen government
items.description: The Senate is in session Friday, but Majority Leader John Thune has given no clear indication of what direction they'll take on votes.

items.title: WATCH:  Pres. Trump says 'only a foolish person' would be against ending the filibuster
items.description: Pres. Trump continued to pressure Senate Republicans to overturn the filibuster on Friday despite Majority Leader John Thune's insistence that it is "...

items.title: Air travel reductions could increase if shutdown continues, Duffy says
items.description: Major airlines say they are planning to cancel hundreds of flights on Friday -- out of thousands of daily flights -- as the FAA is set to begin limiti...

items.title: WATCH:  Airlines begin canceling hundreds of flights due to shutdown-related FAA reductions
items.description: The cancellations are the latest -- and perhaps biggest -- disruption to air travel since the government shutdown began more than a month ago.
